pad_raster

Source: R/padding.R
pad_raster.Rd

Adding padding to raster

pad_raster(landscape, pad_raster_value, pad_raster_cells)

# S3 method for RasterLayer
pad_raster(landscape, pad_raster_value = -999,
  pad_raster_cells = 1)

# S3 method for RasterStack
pad_raster(landscape, pad_raster_value = -999,
  pad_raster_cells = 1)

# S3 method for RasterBrick
pad_raster(landscape, pad_raster_value = -999,
  pad_raster_cells = 1)

# S3 method for list
pad_raster(landscape, pad_raster_value = -999,
  pad_raster_cells = 1)

Arguments

landscape

Raster* Layer, Stack, Brick or a list of rasterLayers.
pad_raster_value

Value of cells added
pad_raster_cells

Number of rows and columns added

Value

raster

References

McGarigal, K., and B. J. Marks. 1995. FRAGSTATS: spatial pattern analysis program for quantifying landscape structure. USDA For. Serv. Gen. Tech. Rep. PNW-351.

Examples

pad_raster(landscape)
#> class       : RasterLayer 
#> dimensions  : 32, 32, 1024  (nrow, ncol, ncell)
#> resolution  : 1, 1  (x, y)
#> extent      : 0, 32, 0, 32  (xmin, xmax, ymin, ymax)
#> coord. ref. : NA 
#> data source : in memory
#> names       : layer 
#> values      : -999, 3  (min, max)
#>
